overview: Rob Backus leads the research and development initiative and is responsible for defining Lucent Mobile’s technology road map. Rob helps our clients to create a mobile strategy while consulting on the technological and market benefits of various mobile platforms and on how decisions of security, mobile architecture, platform, design, and legacy systems integration can affect the bottom line. Having the privilege of being a crucial part of several past technology start-ups, and with the heart of an entrepreneur, Rob has direct experience in harnessing existing IT infrastructure to fuel a company’s mobile initiative.
